description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' used for unit testing, based on Google Mock framework. The class provides mock implementations for the interfaces 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink', including a variety of methods related to service management, paths, states, and notification registration.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A Google Mock class for the 'IShell' and 'ICOMLink' interfaces providing mocked methods for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Mock method returning the version string.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Mock method returning the locator string.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Mock method returning the class name string.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Mock method returning the callsign string.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Mock method returning the web prefix string.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Mock method returning the configuration line string.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Mock method returning persistent storage path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Mock method returning volatile storage path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Mock method returning data storage path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Mock method returning the current state.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Mock method indicating if the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Mock method checking if a feature is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Mock method to enable the web server.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Mock method to disable the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Mock method returning subsystem pointer.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Mock method for submitting a JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Mock method for sending notifications.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Mock method querying interface by callsign.

methods.name: Register (IPlugin::INotification)
methods.description: Mock method for registering plugin notifications.

methods.name: Unregister (IPlugin::INotification)
methods.description: Mock method for unregistering plugin notifications.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Mock method returning model string.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Mock method indicating background state.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Mock method returning accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Mock method returning proxy stub path.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Mock method returning hash key.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Mock method performing string substitution.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Mock method activating the service.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Mock method deactivating the service.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Mock method indicating unavailability.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Mock method returning the current reason/state.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Mock method setting configuration line with input string.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Mock method returning system root path.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Mock method returning system path.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Mock method returning plugin path.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Mock method returning start mode.

methods.name: StartMode (overloaded)
methods.description: Mock method setting start mode.

methods.name: Resumed (overloaded)
methods.description: Mock method setting resumed state.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Mock method retrieving metadata.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Mock method handling hibernation.

methods.name: Register (IRemoteConnection::INotification)
methods.description: Mock method for remote connection notifications.

methods.name: Unregister (IRemoteConnection::INotification)
methods.description: Mock method to unregister remote connection notifications.

methods.name: Register (IShell::ICOMLink::INotification)
methods.description: Mock method for ICOMLink notifications registration.

methods.name: Unregister (IShell::ICOMLink::INotification)
methods.description: Mock method for ICOMLink notifications unregistration.

methods.name: RemoteConnection
methods.description: Mock method returning remote connection object.

methods.description: Mock method for object instantiation.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Mock method returning library search paths.
